name: Charred Reliquary
description: Collapsed vaults smolder beneath the pass, their embers watched by ash-marked guardians.

actions.label: Scavenge the reliquary
actions.description: Pick through the collapsed halls for salvageable relics.
actions.log: You recover ember-touched relics from the reliquary's fringe chambers.

actions.label: Confront the guardian spirit
actions.description: Draw out the reliquary's restless protector.
actions.log: The reliquary's guardian surges from the smoldering vaults!

name: Stormfang Aerie
description: An icy overhang riddled with nests crackling with trapped stormlight.

actions.label: Hunt the Stormfang alpha
actions.description: Challenge the apex predator guarding the nests.
actions.log: An enraged Stormfang alpha barrels from the ice-crusted ledges!

actions.label: Harvest charged nests
actions.description: Carefully extract storm-charged silk from the nests.
actions.log: You gather crackling skeins of glimmer silk from the abandoned nests.

name: Veiled Sanctum
description: Hidden glyph-doors part for those who can read the shimmer of twilight.

actions.label: Decipher the shifting sigils
actions.description: Attempt to unlock the sanctum's hidden cache.

success.message: The sigils flare and reveal a cache of prismatic thread!

failure.message: The sigils lash out with a pulse of voidlight, forcing you back.

actions.label: Leave a moonlit offering
actions.description: Offer provisions to the hidden caretakers in exchange for guidance.
actions.log: Whispers of gratitude echo as soothing twilight mends your wounds.

name: Twilight Hermitage
description: A lone scholar keeps vigil where dusk never fades, trading secrets for stories.

actions.label: Share twilight tea
actions.description: Rest with the hermit and recover beneath the starlit lanterns.
actions.log: The hermit's tea soothes your spirit and replenishes your supplies.

actions.label: Trade insights
actions.description: Swap tales with the hermit to glean practical guidance.
actions.log: You exchange hard-won lessons, leaving with keener insight and a heavier purse.
